price: সেইদিনা সিহঁতে পৰস্পৰে ফুচ-ফুচাই ক’ব, ‘তোমালোকে (পৃথিৱীত) মাত্ৰ দহদিনহে অৱস্থান কৰিছিলা’।
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
